original_text: He is not cruel to anyone. He does not keep anything that he has taken from someone as a guarantee. He does not rob other people. But he gives food to hungry people. He gives clothes to poor people.
korean_text: 사람을 학대하지도 아니하며 저당을 잡지도 아니하며 강탈하지도 아니하고 주린 자에게 음식물을 주며 벗은 자에게 옷을 입히며

sentences.original_text: He is not cruel to anyone.
that he has taken from someone as a guarantee.
He does not rob other people.
But he gives food to hungry people.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그는 굶주린 사람들에게 음식을 줍니다.

sentences.original_text: He gives clothes to poor people.
